trans-unit.source: Azure Privileged Identity Management: How To Start Add a Role to a User
trans-unit.target: Azure Privileged Identity Management: How To Start Add a Role to a User

trans-unit.source: Learn how to add roles to privileged identities with the Azure Privileged Identity Management extension.
trans-unit.target: Learn how to add roles to privileged identities with the Azure Privileged Identity Management extension.

trans-unit.source: Azure Privileged Identity Management: How To Add or Remove a User Role
trans-unit.target: Azure Privileged Identity Management: How To Add or Remove a User Role

trans-unit.source: Adding or Removing a User Role
trans-unit.target: Adding or Removing a User Role

trans-unit.source: There are several ways to navigate to the **Add managed users blade** of the PIM interface.
trans-unit.target: There are several ways to navigate to the **Add managed users blade** of the PIM interface.

trans-unit.source: The click sequence for each is listed below:
trans-unit.target: The click sequence for each is listed below:

trans-unit.source: Paths to Add or Remove a Role to a User
trans-unit.target: Paths to Add or Remove a Role to a User

trans-unit.source: Dashboard > Users in Admin Roles > Add or Remove
trans-unit.target: Dashboard > Users in Admin Roles > Add or Remove

trans-unit.source: Dashboard > Role Summary > All Users List > Add or Remove
trans-unit.target: Dashboard > Role Summary > All Users List > Add or Remove

trans-unit.source: Dashboard > click on user role in role table (for example Global Administrator) > Add or Remove
trans-unit.target: Dashboard > click on user role in role table (for example Global Administrator) > Add or Remove

trans-unit.source: Add a Role to a User from the Users in Admin Roles section or the Role Summary All Users List
trans-unit.target: Add a Role to a User from the Users in Admin Roles section or the Role Summary All Users List

trans-unit.source: Once you have navigated to the **Add managed users** blade...
trans-unit.target: Once you have navigated to the **Add managed users** blade...

trans-unit.source: Click on **Select a role**.
trans-unit.target: Click on **Select a role**.

trans-unit.source: If you have navigated here from clicking on a user role in the role table, then the role will already be selected.
trans-unit.target: If you have navigated here from clicking on a user role in the role table, then the role will already be selected.

trans-unit.source: Select a role from the role list.
trans-unit.target: Select a role from the role list.

trans-unit.source: For example, **Password Administrator**, the **Select users** blade will open.
trans-unit.target: For example, **Password Administrator**, the **Select users** blade will open.

trans-unit.source: Enter the name of the user to which you want to add the role in the search field.
trans-unit.target: Enter the name of the user to which you want to add the role in the search field.

trans-unit.source: If the user is in the directory, their accounts will appear as you are typing as will other users with similar names.
trans-unit.target: If the user is in the directory, their accounts will appear as you are typing as will other users with similar names.

trans-unit.source: Select the user in the list, click **Done**.
trans-unit.target: Select the user in the list, click **Done**.

trans-unit.source: Click **OK** to save your selection.
trans-unit.target: Click **OK** to save your selection.

trans-unit.source: If you don't do this, then the selection will not be saved.
trans-unit.target: If you don't do this, then the selection will not be saved.

trans-unit.source: The user you have selected will appear in the list and the role will be temporary.
trans-unit.target: The user you have selected will appear in the list and the role will be temporary.

trans-unit.source: If you want to make the role permanent, click the user in the list.
trans-unit.target: If you want to make the role permanent, click the user in the list.

trans-unit.source: The user's information will appear in a new blade.
trans-unit.target: The user's information will appear in a new blade.

trans-unit.source: Select **make perm** in the user information menu.
trans-unit.target: Select **make perm** in the user information menu.

trans-unit.source: Click **Activate** to start a request to active this role for the user.
trans-unit.target: Click **Activate** to start a request to active this role for the user.

trans-unit.source: Enter the reason for the activation in the **Request reason** text field.
trans-unit.target: Enter the reason for the activation in the **Request reason** text field.

trans-unit.source: At this time, the role will automatically be activated for this user, and a notification will be sent to global administrators.
trans-unit.target: At this time, the role will automatically be activated for this user, and a notification will be sent to global administrators.

trans-unit.source: Remove a User from a Role
trans-unit.target: Remove a User from a Role

trans-unit.source: Navigate to the user in the user role list using one of the paths described above.
trans-unit.target: Navigate to the user in the user role list using one of the paths described above.

trans-unit.source: Click on the user in the user list.
trans-unit.target: Click on the user in the user list.

trans-unit.source: Click on **Remove**.
trans-unit.target: Click on **Remove**.

trans-unit.source: You will be presented with a confirmation message.
trans-unit.target: You will be presented with a confirmation message.

trans-unit.source: Click Yes to remove the role from the user.
trans-unit.target: Click Yes to remove the role from the user.

trans-unit.source: Next steps
trans-unit.target: Next steps
